attributes.action: UK Launch a diplomatic protest at the descrecation of holy Quran in Sweden.
attributes.background: The UK government and parliamentarians should launch a diplomatic protest at the blaytant misuse of freedom of speech.  The disrespect of the holy sculptures such as the Quran are protected in UK law. The boundaries of freedom of speech should be defined. Going Islamophobia is a great concern.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632549
